about.summary: Tools to more conveniently perform tasks associated with add-on packages. pacman conveniently wraps library and package related functions and names them in an intuitive and consistent fashion.  It seeks to combine functionality from lower level functions which can speed up workflow.

Tools to more conveniently perform tasks associated with add-on packages. pacman conveniently wraps library and package related functions and names them in an intuitive and consistent fashion.  It seeks to combine functionality from lower level functions which can speed up workflow.

name: r-pacman
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.5.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-pacman
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/pacman_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/pacman/pacman_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9ec9a72a15eda5b8f727adc877a07c4b36f8372fe7ed80a1bc6c2068dab3ef7c

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-remotes
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-remotes

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('pacman')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('pacman')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/trinker/pacman
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Tools to more conveniently perform tasks associated with add-on packages. pacman conveniently
    wraps library and package related functions and names them in an intuitive and consistent
    fashion.  It seeks to combine functionality from lower level functions which can
    speed up workflow.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
